item.description: DRAFT: Release Notes for v0.4.0 # This is a major change from the previous one, I’ll likely cut the 1.x soon and start following the more typical Semver conventions. Aka Major version is a breaking change, Minor is just that, patches for previous versions. API SDK Changes: # I have been trying to find a proper library to use so I’m not re-writing and reinventing the wheel so to speak.
